definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: onlyl pl. MT testimonies (always of laws as divine testimonies or solemn charges);—pl. abs. [[עֵדׂת]] De 4:45, De 6:20; sf. (of ´[[י]]), [[עְדׂתִי]] Ps 132:12 (Ges:§ 91 n.), [[עֵדׂתָיו]] De 6:17, Ps 25:10, Ps 99:7, Ps 119:2, [[עֵדוֹתָיו]] Ps 78:56; [[עֵדׂתֶיְ]] Ps 93:5, Ps 119:22, Ps 119:24, Ps 119:46, Ps 119:59, Ps 119:79, Ps 119:95, Ps 119:119, Ps 119:125, Ps 119:138, Ps 119:146, Ps 119:152, Ps 119:167, Ps 119:168 (MT pointing artificial, der. prob. fr. [[עֵדוּת]], reading [[עֵדֻת]] for [[עֵדׂת]], or regarding [[עֵדׂת]] as contr. from [[עֵדְוֹת]], pl. of [[עֵדוּת]] [Sta:§ 320 b SS Buhl]; v. also Dr:De 4:45, De 4:45, De 6:17, De 6:20 are redactional).
